title: 求助有无利用ModTweaker或CraftTweaker修改拔刀剑合成表的方法
txt_content: 如题,写脚本时总出问题

replies.txt_content: recipes.addShapeless(<flammpfeil.slashblade:slashbladewrapper>.withTag({TextureName: "BalkonWood", ench: [{lvl: 1 as short, id: 21 as short}], WrapItem: {id: "minecraft:wooden_sword", Count: 1 as byte, Damage: 0 as short}, SlashBlade: {}, CurrentItemName: "wrap.reforg),[<lastsmith:itemmaterials:3>,<lastsmith:slashbladesaya>,<flammpfeil.slashblade:proudsoul>] 这个是写的代码

DE_SHARK 发表于 2020-7-30 21:05
拔刀剑不支持Crt改吧
那就难受了啊
